abilities.name: Poison Payback
abilities.effect: If Wurmple is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Wurmple is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: String Pull
attacks.effect: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with 1 of the Defending Pokémon. Your opponent chooses the Defending Pokémon to switch.
